snippet: The government’s plan to legalize same-sex marriages  took an unexpected turn on Tuesday with an announcement that the Church of England will be forbidden from marrying same-sex partners.
abstract: Great Britain's plan to legalize same-sex marriages takes step backward with announcement that Church of England will be forbidden under new law from marrying same-sex partners.
lead_paragraph: The government’s plan to legalize same-sex marriages  took an unexpected turn on Tuesday with an announcement that the Church of England will be forbidden from marrying same-sex partners.

headline.seo: British Plan for Gay Marriage Would Exclude Anglican Church
headline.main: British Plan for Gay Marriage Would Exclude Anglican Church
headline.print_headline: Britain: Plan for Gay Marriage Would Exclude Anglican Church

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
